video_prompt: Anime woman kneeling, white hair and green eyes, struggles as red liquid flows from a leg wound. Iridescent, swirling liquid elements bubble and expand around her, particularly near her hands and upper body. Her costume subtly shifts with her movement.
image_prompt: Anime illustration of a white-haired, green-eyed young woman in a traditional golden-brown and red costume with ornate silver jewelry. She is in a crouching pose, with red liquid (blood) on her right thigh, surrounded by iridescent, swirling liquid elements, against a white background.
refined_video_prompt: An anime woman struggles, her body tensing and recoiling. Red liquid steadily flows and spreads from her leg wound. Iridescent, swirling liquid elements dynamically bubble, expand, and pulsate around her, especially near her hands and upper body, their shimmering colors constantly shifting. Her costume's fabric subtly drapes and wrinkles, reacting directly to her every movement and struggle.
